prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that has a cute appearance and vibrant colors.
I want a deer-like Pokemon with a floral crown and a playful personality.
Generate an image of a Pokemon resembling a small animal, with green and white colors.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature, with leafy features and a gentle demeanor.
Imagine a tiny quadruped Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas and loves to frolic.
Design a Pokemon that blends in with its forest surroundings, featuring bright green and soft white.
Show me a playful, nature-themed Pokemon that has a charming, innocent look.
